title: Best Incubation Award
description: It's time to shine a spotlight on innovation and entrepreneurship! Join us at IIITD-IC as we present an exhilarating Investors Meet, where the brightest minds collide. Don't just spectate, participate! If you are a startup who has developed the product and looking for scaling up your venture with backup from VCs, do submit your application.
subtitle: Innovation and Excellence

title: Tech Excellence Award
description: Recognizing outstanding achievements in technology and innovation. Be inspired by the remarkable journeys of award-winning startups.
subtitle: Tech Innovation

title: Young Achievers Award
description: Celebrating the remarkable accomplishments of young entrepreneurs making a significant impact in the tech industry.
subtitle: Young Talent
